ovdesc.p: This table used to maintain the yearly Non Sufficient transaction ,Overdraft and untauthorised count,fees record by month and daywise
@ID will be account number and YYYYMM ex: 62588-201305

desc.p: Current date of the transaction ger processed.
This field holds the Non sufficient count transaction occured on that day.
This field holds the Overdraft count transaction occured on that day.
This field holds the unauthorised count transaction occured on that day.
This field holds the Non sufficient charges transaction occured on that day.
This field holds the Overdraft charges transaction occured on that day.
This field holds the unauthorised charges transaction occured on that day.
This field holds an transaction reference processed on that day . this is a sub associate set
